create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts, 40-60s high-retention philosophy rap
Primary request: Context compression: modern life noise versus inner inquiry.
Scene/background: transition from crowded digital city motion to calm corridor of light
Subject: abstract notification particles dissolving into question-mark glyph trails
Action: 0-4s chaotic fast-cut digital overload; 4-8s motion slows and glyphs align; 8-12s pathway opens to clear focal point
Camera: vertical tracking shot with fast cuts, zoom-ins every 2-3s
Lighting/mood: start harsh cool lights, resolve into warm balanced glow
Color palette: deep blue, graphite, gold accents, cyan
Style/format: contemporary social-first visual language, clean and punchy
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: readable text, logo marks, face distortion, jitter
